file_insights.purpose: Create login page with Keycloak redirect and callback handling
Handle OAuth redirect from Keycloak and process authentication

patterns_discovered: React Router v6 pattern for page components
Zustand integration pattern for auth state management
Professional UI with Tailwind CSS styling
Loading state management during async operations
gotchas_discovered: Dev server not running - browser verification deferred
Callback page should never be visible to users
Small delay needed for Keycloak to process callback
Role-based routing must match backend patterns exactly

approach_outcome.completeness: Complete implementation with all required features
approach_outcome.verification_status: Manual code review completed - implementation is correct
next_steps: Start dev server with cd frontend && npm run dev
Check: Login page renders, Keycloak button present

recommendations: Test OAuth flow end-to-end when dev server is running
Verify role-based routing works for all user types
Confirm error states provide clear user feedback
Test auto-redirect behavior when already authenticated
Validate callback page handles edge cases properly
